dc.title: U.S. Department of the Interior Library
dc.description: The U.S. Department of the Interior Library promotes the mission of the Department by providing a full range of professional reference and research services, available to Interior employees in both the Washington, DC, area and nationwide. The Library's collections include Departmental publications, as well as a broad range of related books, journals, and other resources that support the Department's missions. The Library is open from 7:45 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Monday through Friday (except Federal holidays) and is open to the public.
dc.subject: United States Department of the Interior Library Collections Periodicals Database Online Books Programs Speaker Series
